name: claude-code-plugins
description: A curated bundle of Claude Code plugins including Agent SDK tools, PR review suites, commit workflows, and security alerts.

plugins.name: agent-sdk-dev
plugins.description: Development toolkit for seamless integration with the Claude Agent SDK.

plugins.name: pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents focused on comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and simplification.

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Automate git commit workflows: commit, push, and PR creation made easy.

plugins.name: feature-dev
plugins.description: End-to-end feature development workflow with agents for code exploration, architecture design, and quality review.

plugins.name: security-guidance
plugins.description: Security alert agent warning about potential risks like command injection, XSS, and unsafe coding patterns.
